entity_id.description: The identifier for the entity that was tested for authorization

authority_id.description: The identifier for the authority that was queried

action.description: The action that the query is checking Authorization for

resource.description: The resource that the query is checking Authorization for

authorized.description: True if the action+resource authorization has been confirmed, false otherwise

time_requested.description: The server time that was requested (may be blank)

time_evaluated.description: The server time that was used in the query

message.description: Additional details attached to the response about the authorization response

context.description: The context object that was supplied for the query that was evaluated

time.description: Time for query to use. RFC3339 required.

locator.description: Provided for systems that require additional information to locate the records in question.
